name: By Wheat & Blade
description:
By Wheat & Blade is a strategy survival. In the game you will try your best to over come the harsh winters, and manage the relationship with the surrounding lords. You are in charge of a handful of people, do not let them starve.

Hello my name is Nadav and this is my entry to  the extra credits #3 game jam "Cycals". I only had a day out of the four to work on it but hope to get any feedback seeing as this is my first ever game jam.
